greeting: Kya aap apne business ki efficiency badhane me interested hain?
question: Hamare ERP system se aapka inventory aur accounting automation ho sakta hai. Kya aap ek quick demo dekhna chahenge?
follow_up: Aapke liye kaunsa time convenient rahega subah ya shaam?
closing: Theek hai {name} ji, hum aapko demo ke liye update karenge. Dhanyawaad!
